questions.question: It means more to me when my partner…
choices: Surprises me with a thoughtful gift
Tells me they’re proud of me or love me
Holds my hand or cuddles with me
Does something helpful without being asked

questions.question: I feel most connected when we…
choices: Go on a planned date with no phones
Exchange long, sweet texts or talks
Just sit together touching or hugging
They take something off my to-do list

questions.question: On a tough day, I’d rather my partner…
choices: Brings me my favorite treat or something small
Says “I believe in you, you’ve got this”
Gives me a long hug or back rub
Handles dinner or chores so I can rest

questions.question: I feel most loved when they…
choices: Remember tiny details and get me the perfect gift
Compliment me in front of others
Reach for my hand in public
Fill my car with gas or fix something broken

questions.question: A weekend with no plans sounds perfect if we…
choices: Do absolutely nothing but be together the whole time
Have deep conversations late into the night
Are physically close—cuddling, kissing, etc.
They plan and handle everything so I can relax

questions.question: Which apology feels most sincere to you?
choices: They bring a “sorry” gift or flowers
They look me in the eye and say heartfelt words
They pull me into a big hug and don’t let go
They immediately fix whatever went wrong

questions.question: I light up most when my partner…
choices: Surprises me with tickets or something I wanted
Leaves me a loving note or voice message
Greets me with a kiss and long hug
Washes the dishes or runs my errands

questions.question: After a long trip apart, I want them to…
choices: Have a welcome-home gift waiting
Tell me how much they missed me
Hold me for ages at the airport
Have already unpacked or handled laundry

questions.question: Little daily things that make me melt:
choices: Finding a small present on my pillow
Hearing “You look amazing” or “I’m so lucky”
Random kisses or playing with my hair
They made my coffee exactly right

questions.question: My heart feels fullest when they…
choices: Celebrate my wins with a special gift
Publicly brag about me or post loving words
Are physically affectionate all day
Take care of something I hate doing

score.high: Words of Affirmation  Your love tank fills fastest with heartfelt words, compliments, and verbal appreciation.
score.medium: Quality Time  or Physical Touch  (Tie—check which category you picked more!)
score.low: Acts of Service  or Receiving Gifts  (These still matter, but they’re not your primary language.)
